existing_features.title: Add a visible toggle switch on the Resident Profile page that lets the user choose whether the printed Resident Profile Report includes additional blank fields for "Physician's Name" and "Physician's Signature".

Update the print-only Resident Profile Report so that, when the toggle is enabled, the printed document includes a dedicated area with blank lines for "Physician's Name" and "Physician's Signature" suitable for handwriting.
Add any necessary print CSS to style the new physician name/signature blank lines so they print reliably (e.g., consistent line thickness, spacing) without impacting existing print report styling.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a visible toggle on the resident profile to print the resident profile with space for Physician's Name and Signature

projectName: Add resident profile print toggle for physician name/signature fields
